text: Kɨ gumazitamɨn gantɨ an arazir kuratam damutɨ, kɨ suam, an aremegham. Eghtɨ nɨ ikiangsɨzim a danɨng a mɨkɨm suam, a uan navim giragh arazir kurar kaba atakigh. Nɨ a mɨkɨman aghuaghtɨ, an arazir kuraba kamaghɨra ikɨtɨ an aremegham. Eghtɨ nan damazimɨn, an osɨmtɨzimɨn ghuzim nɨn dafarimɨn ikiam.
